replies.author: no3363
replies.txt_content:
MC时空之城 发表于 2015-3-7 15:27
给builder组添加权限 plotme.auto
在配置文件里添加这条么0.0

replies.author: no3363
replies.txt_content:
no3363 发表于 2015-3-7 15:42
在配置文件里添加这条么0.0
我的是users

replies.author: sunaoke
replies.txt_content: 只需输入：/mangaddp default plotme.limit.1 然后输入：/mangaddp builder plotme.limit.1 玩家输入：/plotme auto就可以领取了 ，找的不容易，给最佳吧{:10_513:}

replies.author: nnyilun
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder plotme.use 即可~

更多权限节点去看下面的链接
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-236421-1-1.html

replies.author: Yinyu
replies.txt_content:
给予玩家权限,

plotme.use即可。
